price: Na katika Ishara zake ni kuwa kakuumbeni kwa udongo. Kisha mmekuwa watu mlio tawanyika kote kote.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَنۡ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ إِذَآ أَنتُم بَشَرٞ تَنتَشِرُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi an khalaqakum min turābin thumma idhā antum basharun tantashirūna
